docs.snippet: Peter McKenzie was a cotton and linen salesman -- and apparently a good one. In twenty-five years in the textile field he had become an executive of the company he represented. Yet, ironically, his heart was not in this work and his interest in it...
docs.lead_paragraph: Peter McKenzie was a cotton and linen salesman -- and apparently a good one. In twenty-five years in the textile field he had become an executive of the company he represented. Yet, ironically, his heart was not in this work and his interest in it had diminished with the years.
docs.abstract: McKenzie, Peter, SS Uruguay (Moare-McCormack) steward, retires at 72 after 27 yrs at sea

headline.main: Late Starter Ends Second Career; Retires After 27 Years on Ships; In His Mid-Forties, Scotsman Was Textile Executive -- Now Quits the Sea at 72

docs.snippet: In Venezuela censorship blacked out election returns. In Colombia mob action put two newspapers temporarily out of business.
docs.lead_paragraph: In Venezuela censorship blacked out election returns. In Colombia mob action put two newspapers temporarily out of business.

headline.main: CENSORSHIP STUDY HITS AT VENEZUELA; Blackout of Election Returns Highlights Report -- Egypt's Relaxed Rules Stressed

docs.snippet: Holiday influences dominated the trading in the foreign exchanges last week. Business was light, due to the relatively small commercial demand.
docs.lead_paragraph: Holiday influences dominated the trading in the foreign exchanges last week. Business was light, due to the relatively small commercial demand.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Dec. 26, 1952
